top10.title: Fallen Angels
top10.description: Wong Kar-wai's neon-soaked masterpiece follows two hitmen and their relationships in Hong Kong's urban landscape, exploring themes of loneliness, connection, and missed opportunities.

top10.title: Train to Busan
top10.description: A father and daughter board a train to Busan during a zombie outbreak in South Korea. This emotional thriller combines intense action with heartfelt family drama.

top10.title: RRR
top10.description: Two legendary revolutionaries embark on a journey away from home before they begin fighting back against British colonialists. S.S. Rajamouli's epic action spectacle featuring incredible stunts and emotional storytelling.

top10.title: Inception
top10.description: Dom Cobb leads a team of specialists who enter people's dreams to steal secrets. When tasked with the impossible job of inception, reality and dreams blur in Christopher Nolan's mind-bending thriller.

top10.title: Rye Lane
top10.description: Two twenty-somethings reeling from bad breakups connect over the course of an eventful day in South London. A vibrant, witty romantic comedy that captures the energy and diversity of modern London.

top10.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
top10.description: After a painful breakup, Joel undergoes a procedure to erase memories of his ex-girlfriend Clementine. Charlie Kaufman's poignant exploration of love, memory, and the beauty of imperfect relationships.

top10.title: Sunshine
top10.description: A team of scientists on a mission to revive the sun is stranded on a desolate planet after a catastrophic solar flare. A visually stunning sci-fi thriller that explores the fragility of life and the power of human resilience.

top10.title: Phantom Thread
top10.description: A renowned dressmaker's carefully controlled life is disrupted by a young woman who becomes his muse and lover. Paul Thomas Anderson's elegant psychological drama about obsession, control, and toxic love.

top10.title: Amadeus
top10.description: The story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart told through the eyes of his jealous rival Antonio Salieri. Milos Forman's lavish period drama exploring genius, envy, and the divine nature of artistic talent.

top10.title: Shall We Dance?
top10.description: A middle-aged businessman secretly takes ballroom dancing lessons to escape his mundane life. A gentle Japanese comedy-drama about finding passion, self-expression, and joy in unexpected places.

animation.title: Spirited Away
animation.description: A young girl enters a magical world ruled by spirits and witches after her parents are transformed into pigs. Hayao Miyazaki's masterpiece about courage, friendship, and environmental consciousness.

animation.title: Howl's Moving Castle
animation.description: A young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch and must find a way to break the spell. Miyazaki's enchanting tale of self-acceptance, love, and the horrors of war, featuring a magnificent moving castle.

animation.title: The Boy and the Beast
animation.description: A young boy stumbles into a world of beasts and becomes the disciple of a gruff warrior. Mamoru Hosoda's coming-of-age adventure about finding family and strength in unexpected places.

animation.title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
animation.description: The Mystery Inc. gang encounters real monsters for the first time on a spooky Louisiana island. A darker, more mature Scooby-Doo adventure that brought genuine scares to the beloved franchise.

animation.title: It's Such a Beautiful Day
animation.description: A man named Bill struggles with mental illness and mortality in this experimental animated film. Don Hertzfeldt's profound meditation on life, death, and consciousness told through stick figures and philosophical narration.

animation.title: The Iron Giant
animation.description: A boy befriends a massive robot from outer space during the Cold War. Brad Bird's heartwarming tale about friendship, choice, and what it means to be a hero, featuring stunning hand-drawn animation.

animation.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
animation.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and meets other Spider-People from parallel dimensions. A groundbreaking animated film that revolutionized superhero storytelling with stunning visuals and heartfelt coming-of-age themes.

animation.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
animation.description: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse and meets a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its existence. A visually stunning sequel that pushes animation boundaries while exploring identity and belonging.

animation.title: Princess Mononoke
animation.description: A young warrior becomes embroiled in a struggle between forest gods and humans consuming natural resources. Miyazaki's epic environmental fable about the balance between civilization and nature.

animation.title: My Neighbor Totoro
animation.description: Two young sisters discover magical forest spirits near their new home in rural Japan. Miyazaki's gentle masterpiece about childhood wonder, family bonds, and finding magic in everyday life.

animation.title: Inside Out
animation.description: The emotions inside an 11-year-old girl's mind struggle to help her navigate a difficult move to a new city. Pixar's brilliant exploration of mental health and emotional intelligence for all ages.

animation.title: Monsters, Inc.
animation.description: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but everything changes when a little girl enters their world. Pixar's imaginative comedy about friendship, courage, and overcoming prejudice.

animation.title: Robot Dreams
animation.description: A lonely dog builds a robot companion in 1980s New York City. A wordless animated gem about friendship, loss, and the bittersweet nature of relationships told through beautiful hand-drawn animation.

animation.title: WALL-E
animation.description: A lonely robot left to clean a deserted Earth meets EVE and follows her across the galaxy. Pixar's environmental love story that says more with minimal dialogue than most films do with endless words.

animation.title: Ratatouille
animation.description: A rat with culinary dreams teams up with a young chef in a Parisian restaurant. Pixar's delicious tale about following your passion, artistic integrity, and the idea that anyone can cook.

animation.title: Perfect Blue
animation.description: A pop idol's transition to acting triggers a psychological breakdown as reality and fantasy blur. Satoshi Kon's disturbing psychological thriller about identity, fame, and the dark side of celebrity culture.

animation.title: The Lego Movie
animation.description: An ordinary LEGO construction worker is mistakenly identified as the most extraordinary person and the key to saving the world. A surprisingly clever and heartfelt adventure about creativity and individuality.

animation.title: Shrek
animation.description: A grumpy ogre's quiet life is upended when fairy tale creatures are dumped in his swamp. DreamWorks' irreverent fairy tale parody that subverts Disney tropes while delivering genuine heart and humor.

animation.title: Shrek 2
animation.description: Shrek and Fiona visit her parents' kingdom where they encounter new challenges to their relationship. A worthy sequel that expands the fairy tale satire while exploring themes of acceptance and self-worth.

animation.title: The Little Mermaid
animation.description: A mermaid princess dreams of living on land and makes a deal with a sea witch to become human. Disney's Renaissance-launching musical about following your dreams and finding your voice.

animation.title: Beauty and the Beast
animation.description: A young woman becomes prisoner to a beast in his castle but learns to see beyond his exterior. Disney's tale as old as time about love, inner beauty, and the transformative power of compassion.

animation.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
animation.description: A deformed bell-ringer falls in love with a gypsy dancer while his guardian plots against her people. Disney's darkest animated film tackles themes of prejudice, religious hypocrisy, and social justice.

animation.title: Chicken Run
animation.description: Chickens on a farm plot their escape before they're turned into pies. Aardman's claymation masterpiece that parodies prison break films while delivering laughs and genuine suspense.

animation.title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
animation.description: A tiny shell with shoes searches for his missing family with the help of a documentary filmmaker. A charming stop-motion film about resilience, community, and finding wonder in small things.

animation.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
animation.description: A fox's return to his thieving ways puts his family and community in danger. Wes Anderson's stop-motion adaptation of Roald Dahl's tale about midlife crisis, family, and staying true to your nature.

animation.title: Coraline
animation.description: A young girl discovers a secret door in her new home that leads to an alternate version of her life. Henry Selick's darkly beautiful stop-motion tale about appreciating what you have.

animation.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
animation.description: The Pumpkin King of Halloween Town discovers Christmas and tries to take over the holiday. Tim Burton's gothic musical about identity, purpose, and appreciating what makes you unique.

animation.title: Corpse Bride
animation.description: A nervous groom accidentally marries a deceased bride during wedding rehearsal. Tim Burton's macabre romance about love, death, and choosing between duty and passion told through stop-motion artistry.

animation.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
animation.description: A fairy shrinks a human logger to fairy size to teach him about environmental destruction. An early environmental animated film about protecting nature and the consequences of deforestation.

animation.title: The Secret of NIMH
animation.description: A field mouse seeks help from mysterious rats to save her sick son. Don Bluth's dark and beautiful tale about courage, sacrifice, and the lengths a mother will go to protect her children.

animation.title: Meet the Robinsons
animation.description: A young inventor travels to the future and meets his eccentric future family. Disney's time-travel adventure about embracing failure, moving forward, and the importance of family bonds.

animation.title: Rock-A-Doodle
animation.description: A rooster's crow brings the sun up each morning until he's banished and eternal night threatens the farm. Don Bluth's musical adventure about believing in yourself and the power of hope.

animation.title: The Great Mouse Detective
animation.description: A mouse detective investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker in Victorian London. Disney's Sherlock Holmes pastiche featuring clever mysteries, memorable villains, and the studio's return to form.

animation.title: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
animation.description: Three kindergarten superhero girls accidentally create a monster while trying to be normal kids. The origin story of the beloved Cartoon Network series about girl power and heroic responsibility.

animation.title: Osmosis Jones
animation.description: A white blood cell cop teams up with a cold pill to fight a deadly virus inside a man's body. A unique blend of live-action and animation that makes biology fun and accessible for kids.

international.title: Rashomon
international.description: Four witnesses give contradictory accounts of a samurai's murder and the rape of his wife. Akira Kurosawa's groundbreaking film that revolutionized narrative structure and explores the nature of truth.

international.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
international.description: On a remote Irish island, lifelong friends Pádraic and Colm find their friendship abruptly ended when Colm decides he no longer wants to be friends. Martin McDonagh's darkly comic meditation on friendship and legacy.

international.title: Castaway on the Moon
international.description: A suicidal man becomes stranded on a small island in the Han River and learns to survive while a reclusive woman watches him from her apartment. A quirky Korean romance about isolation and human connection.

international.title: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
Amélie
international.description: A shy waitress in Montmartre decides to help those around her find happiness while discovering love herself. Jean-Pierre Jeunet's whimsical romantic comedy celebrates the magic in everyday life.

international.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
international.description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation. Ang Lee's poetic martial arts masterpiece.

international.title: The Good, the Bad, the Weird

thriller.title: Love Lies Bleeding
thriller.description: A reclusive gym manager falls hard for an ambitious bodybuilder, but their romance leads them into a violent criminal underworld. Rose Glass's neon-soaked thriller about obsessive love and small-town corruption.

thriller.title: Gone Girl
thriller.description: When his wife Amy disappears, Nick becomes the prime suspect in her disappearance. David Fincher's dark psychological thriller explores marriage, media manipulation, and the facades people create.

thriller.title: Bound
thriller.description: A woman falls for her neighbor and they plot to steal money from the mob. The Wachowskis' stylish neo-noir thriller about love, betrayal, and the lengths people go to for freedom.

superhero.title: The Batman
superhero.description: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. Matt Reeves' dark detective story featuring Robert Pattinson as a younger, more vulnerable Dark Knight.

superhero.title: The Suicide Squad
superhero.description: A group of supervillains are sent on a dangerous mission to a remote island to destroy a Nazi-era laboratory. James Gunn's irreverent and violent take on the DC antihero team.

superhero.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
superhero.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe. Marvel's space opera that combines humor, heart, and an awesome soundtrack.

drama.title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
drama.description: A six-year-old girl named Hushpuppy lives with her father in a southern Delta community called the Bathtub. Benh Zeitlin's magical realist tale about resilience, community, and environmental change told through a child's eyes.

drama.title: Challengers
drama.description: A tennis prodigy turned coach gets caught between her former best friend and her husband in a love triangle that plays out on and off the court. Luca Guadagnino's sexy sports drama about ambition, desire, and competition.

drama.title: Whiplash
drama.description: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where he encounters a ruthless instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential. Damien Chazelle's intense psychological drama about the cost of perfection.

drama.title: The Favourite
drama.description: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne while her close friend Lady Sarah governs the country. Yorgos Lanthimos' wickedly funny period piece about power, manipulation, and female rivalry.

drama.title: Girl, Interrupted
drama.description: A young woman's 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s becomes a journey of self-discovery. Based on Susanna Kaysen's memoir, featuring powerful performances from Winona Ryder and Angelina Jolie.

drama.title: The Florida Project
drama.description: A six-year-old girl and her friends spend their summer exploring the world around a budget motel while her mother struggles with unemployment. Sean Baker's heartbreaking portrait of childhood innocence amid poverty.

drama.title: The Scarlet Letter
drama.description: In Puritan New England, a woman is ostracized after bearing a child out of wedlock. Roland Joffé's adaptation of Nathaniel Hawthorne's classic novel about sin, redemption, and social judgment.

drama.title: Untamed Heart
drama.description: A shy busboy with a heart condition falls in love with a waitress who doesn't believe in love. A tender romantic drama about finding connection and overcoming past trauma.

drama.title: Mona Lisa Smile
drama.description: A progressive art history professor challenges her conservative students at Wellesley College in the 1950s. A drama about breaking traditional expectations and encouraging women to think for themselves.

drama.title: I Am Sam
drama.description: A mentally disabled man fights for custody of his seven-year-old daughter. Sean Penn delivers a powerful performance in this emotional drama about parental love and the definition of family.

drama.title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
drama.description: The friendship between the son of a Nazi commandant and a Jewish boy in a concentration camp leads to tragic consequences. A powerful and heartbreaking story about innocence lost during the Holocaust.

horror.title: Nope
horror.description: Residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery. Jordan Peele's ambitious sci-fi horror about spectacle, exploitation, and our relationship with the unknown.

horror.title: Get Out
horror.description: A young Black man visits his white girlfriend's family estate and uncovers a disturbing secret. Jordan Peele's brilliant social thriller that uses horror to explore racism and cultural appropriation.

horror.title: The Love Witch
horror.description: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences. Anna Biller's stylish homage to 1960s Technicolor films that explores female desire and male fragility.

horror.title: The Lighthouse
horror.description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s. Robert Eggers' psychological horror about isolation, madness, and maritime mythology.

horror.title: Crimson Peak
horror.description: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Guillermo del Toro's gothic romance filled with stunning visuals and supernatural terror.

scifi.title: Moon
scifi.description: A man nearing the end of his three-year lunar mission makes a disturbing discovery about his identity. Duncan Jones' intimate sci-fi thriller featuring a powerhouse performance by Sam Rockwell.

scifi.title: Dune: Part Two
scifi.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Denis Villeneuve's epic continuation of the Dune saga with stunning visuals and political intrigue.

scifi.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

comedy.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Mean Girls
comedy.description: A home-schooled girl enters public high school and becomes involved with the popular clique. Tina Fey's sharp satire of teenage social hierarchies that launched countless quotable moments.

comedy.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Moonrise Kingdom
comedy.description: Two twelve-year-olds fall in love and run away together on a New England island in 1965. Wes Anderson's whimsical coming-of-age tale filled with his signature visual style and deadpan humor.

comedy.title: Inherent Vice
comedy.description: A drug-fueled detective investigates the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend in 1970s Los Angeles. Paul Thomas Anderson's psychedelic neo-noir based on Thomas Pynchon's novel, featuring Joaquin Phoenix in a hazy, paranoid performance.

comedy.title: Beetlejuice
comedy.description: A recently deceased couple hire a bio-exorcist to help them haunt the new inhabitants of their home. Tim Burton's darkly comic supernatural romp featuring Michael Keaton's iconic performance.

comedy.title: Licorice Pizza
comedy.description: A coming-of-age story about a teenage actor and an older woman navigating an unlikely friendship in 1970s San Fernando Valley. Paul Thomas Anderson's nostalgic and charming tale of young love and growing up.

comedy.title: The Half of It
comedy.description: A shy student helps a jock woo a girl they both like, leading to an unexpected love triangle. Alice Wu's thoughtful coming-of-age story about identity, friendship, and the complexity of love.

comedy.title: Do Revenge
comedy.description: Two teenage girls form an unlikely alliance to take down each other's bullies in this dark comedy. A stylish teen thriller that updates classic revenge plots with modern sensibilities and sharp wit.

comedy.title: Problemista
comedy.description: An aspiring toy designer from El Salvador navigates the bureaucratic nightmare of staying in New York. Julio Torres' surreal comedy about immigration, dreams, and the absurdity of modern life.

comedy.title: The Holdovers
comedy.description: A curmudgeonly teacher is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break with a troubled student. Alexander Payne's heartwarming comedy-drama about unlikely friendships and second chances.

musical.title: Singin' in the Rain
musical.description: A silent film production company struggles to adapt to the coming of sound films. Gene Kelly and Stanley Donen's joyous musical celebrating the magic of movies and the transition from silent films to talkies.

musical.title: Fiddler on the Roof
musical.description: A Jewish milkman in pre-revolutionary Russia struggles with tradition and change as his daughters challenge the old ways. The beloved Broadway musical about family, faith, and the passage of time.

musical.title: Funny Girl
musical.description: The story of Fanny Brice's rise from Brooklyn chorus girl to Ziegfeld Follies star. Barbra Streisand's iconic film debut showcasing her powerhouse vocals and comedic timing.

musical.title: Chicago
musical.description: Two murderesses on death row compete for fame and the spotlight in 1920s Chicago. Rob Marshall's dazzling musical adaptation featuring show-stopping numbers and stellar performances from Catherine Zeta-Jones and Renée Zellweger.

musical.title: Grease
musical.description: High school sweethearts Danny and Sandy reunite at Rydell High, but their summer romance faces the challenges of teenage social dynamics. The ultimate feel-good musical with unforgettable songs.

musical.title: Cinderella
musical.description: Rodgers and Hammerstein's beloved fairy tale comes to life with Brandy as Cinderella and Whitney Houston as the Fairy Godmother. A diverse, magical adaptation that celebrates dreams coming true.

action.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
action.description: A Chinese-American laundromat owner discovers she must connect with parallel universe versions of herself to prevent a powerful being from destroying the multiverse. A wildly inventive blend of action, comedy, and family drama.

action.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
action.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrant who controls the land's water supply. George Miller's explosive return to the Mad Max franchise with practical stunts and relentless action.

action.title: Logan
action.description: An aging Wolverine cares for Professor X while protecting a young mutant girl from dark forces. A gritty, emotional farewell to Hugh Jackman's iconic character that redefines superhero storytelling.

action.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World
action.description: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes to win her heart. Edgar Wright's energetic adaptation of the graphic novel series, packed with video game references and visual flair.

action.title: Charlie's Angels
action.description: Three female private investigators work for a mysterious millionaire to solve dangerous cases. A stylish action-comedy that combines martial arts, gadgets, and girl power with tongue-in-cheek humor.

action.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
The Man in the Iron Mask
action.description: The aging musketeers reunite to replace the cruel King Louis XIV with his twin brother. A swashbuckling adventure featuring sword fights, palace intrigue, and the legendary friendship of the Three Musketeers.

romance.title: The Shape of Water
romance.description: A mute janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature held in a government laboratory. Guillermo del Toro's fairy tale for adults about love transcending all boundaries.

romance.title: 500 Days of Summer
romance.description: A greeting card writer reflects on his relationship with Summer, a woman who doesn't believe in love. A non-linear romantic comedy-drama that deconstructs the typical love story.

romance.title: 13 Going on 30
romance.description: A 13-year-old girl wakes up in her 30-year-old body and must navigate adult life and love. A charming romantic fantasy about growing up, second chances, and finding true love.

romance.title: Sometimes I Think About Dying
romance.description: A lonely office worker fantasizes about death until a new coworker shows her what living might look like. A gentle, melancholic comedy about depression, connection, and finding reasons to keep going.

romance.title: The Other Sister
romance.description: A mentally challenged woman fights for independence and finds love while her overprotective mother struggles to let go. A heartwarming story about family, acceptance, and the right to live your own life.

romance.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
romance.description: A woman realizes she's in love with her best friend just days before his wedding to another woman. A romantic comedy that subverts expectations about love, friendship, and getting what you want.

romance.title: Ever After
romance.description: A spirited young woman in Renaissance France captures the heart of Prince Henry in this reimagining of Cinderella. Drew Barrymore stars in this feminist fairy tale about love, class, and staying true to yourself.

romance.title: Timer
romance.description: In a world where a device counts down to when you'll meet your soulmate, a woman questions whether true love can be predetermined. A clever romantic comedy that explores fate, timing, and the nature of love.
